Our Locations

Where we create culinary masterpieces that combine exceptional flavors, artistic presentation, and innovative techniques.

123 Rue de la Fantaisie, Paris, France.

Nestled in the heart of Paris, "Le Gourmet Étoilé" is a Michelin-starred restaurant renowned for its exquisite French cuisine. Discover a world of gastronomic delight that harmoniously blends tradition and innovation under the twinkling lights of the Eiffel Tower.

Open in maps

456 Via dell'Immaginazione, Rome, Italy.

"Ristorante Stellato Roma" is a Michelin-starred gem in the heart of Rome, where culinary excellence meets timeless Italian traditions, inviting diners on an unforgettable journey through the flavors of Italy's rich gastronomic heritage.

Open in maps

789 Neue Straße der Phantasie, Berlin, Germany.

At "Delikate Geschmack" , a Michelin-starred heaven in Berlin, culinary imagination takes flight as the chef - Itamar Alon, crafts exquisite dishes that seamlessly blend German tradition with global influences, offering a gastronomic voyage that lingers in the senses long after the last bite.

Open in maps

My Services

My food service blends passion and precision, delivering delectable experiences that satisfy both appetite and soul.

Private Dinner

With culinary artistry that dances on your taste buds, Chef Itamar transforms your dining room into a gourmet haven, crafting unforgettable private meals that elevate every occasion.

Mentoring

Chef Itamar, a culinary virtuoso, imparts the art of gastronomy with seasoned expertise, sculpting aspiring chefs into culinary maestros through hands-on mentorship.

Author

Itamar, the visionary cooking book author, weaves his culinary tales into each page, inviting readers on a flavorful journey through his delectable recipes and food stories.

Workshops

Chef Itamar conducts private workshops, igniting culinary passions one apron at a time, as she imparts the secrets of gourmet cooking to eager enthusiasts in an intimate setting.
